activities: We connect the public with academic research. As such, we collect the name and e-mail address of interested individuals (with their consent) and any responses to Yes/No questions that our client may pose (i.e., Do you wear glasses?, Are you left-handed?).
privacyprograms: We have completed local privacy training in PIttsburgh, PA and implement a self-regulated, in-house privacy program in accordance with the Safe Harbor Privacy PRinciples.
recoursemech: We are registered with the US Council for International Business with the EU Data Protection Authorities.
